name: THE NATIONAL INDUSTRIAL TRANSPORTATION LEAGUE
description: Trade association representing the commercial freight transportation industry
sampleDescriptions: Discuss with Congressional staff regulatory reform issues before the Surface Transportation Board, including STB EP 711 concerning competitive switching arrangements between railroads
Meeting with House and Senate staff members on NITL Shipping Act reform proposals.  No formal legislation is currently pending on this issue
Meetings with House and Senate staff members on NITL Shipping Act reform proposals.  H.R.4996 - Ocean Shipping Reform Act of 2021.
Meetings with House and Senate staff members on Ocean Shipping Reform Act of 2021 (H.R. 4996); prepare briefing materials and papers.
Discussions with House and Senate staff members on Ocean Shipping Reform Act of 2021 (H.R. 4996) and Ocean Shipping Reform Act of 2022 (S. 3580); prepare briefing materials and papers.
